{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-620 |revision=D/F1A |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=11/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405D |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSD-5G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, unpopulated,, 4-pin header,, internal,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Wireless N300 Router''' [http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/5/1854_b.html Product page] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-620 ''DIR-620 (A1,D1 and F1)'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] : D-Link DIR-620/D/F1A : D-Link DIR-620 F1(MTK) REV.B *CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620N]] *RAM: 64 MiB DDR1 EM6AB160TSD *Flash: 8 MiB SPI MX25L6405D See also [[D-Link DIR-620]].. ===Revisions=== 
Rev.	Chip			RAM	Flash
A1	Ralink   RT3052F 384MHz	32MB	8MB
B1	Ralink   RT3052F 384MHz	32MB	8MB
S/C1	Broadcom BCM5357 530MHz	64MB	8MB
D1	Ralink   RT3352F 400MHz	32MB	8MB
D/F1	MediaTek MT7620NÂ 580MHz	64MB	8MB
S/G1	Broadcom BCM5357 500MHz	32MB    8MB
http://dir620d1.kazarova.ru/ ===Pinouts=== ====Serial port:==== {| | Pin | Value |- | 1 (key) | Vcc (+3.3 V) |- | 2 | Rx (Data Receive) |- | 3 | Tx (Data Transmit) |- | 4 | GND (Ground) |} ====JTAG:==== *don't pins, but may connect to points on board (see picture). ==Image== File:Dir620f1_pcb.jpg|PCB top [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
